Caption: “The Second Trinity of IIT Madras”
Description: Prof. Ajit Kolar calls the three dignitaries shown above, “The Second Trinity of IIT Madras”. Sitting from left: Mr. R. Natarajan, Registrar, Dr. A. L. Mudaliar, Chairman, Board of Governors and Prof. B. Sengupto, Director. “The First Trinity” comprises of President Heuss, Chancellor Adenauer and President Nehru according to Prof. Kolar.
